String.string: There's no way...no way at all.
Travel to Acarum in Westonia and speak with Harule.
Find Maianwe near the road to Allemantheia east of Acarum.
Find Legate Alssiyah at the Gloomhaunt Sentry Post in the Citadel of Torment.
Speak with Meygren at the Gloomhaunt Sentry Post.
Once Verminath reads the Tome of Agonies...what? Intruder!
Argh! It won't be so easy to kill the Toxic Jester!
Eliminate the cursed jesters on the fourth floor of the Citadel of Torment.
What's this? An offering for Thulsa!
Find the Verminaths on the fourth floor of the Citadel of Torment. Kill them and take their Tomes of Agonies.
Bring the tome to Meygren at the Gloomhaunt Sentry Post.
Find Lastair in the Citadel of Torment and ask about a secret research facility in the basement.
